TextEng: "Never mind."
"Any advice you can offer?"
"You all right in there?"
"You don't sound very happy."
"This must be difficult for you."
"Not really."
"Yes."
"I agree. I wish there was something I could do."
Text: "동의해. 내가 뭔가 해줄 수 있으면 좋겠는데."

TextEng: "Maybe I could try to see if you're right."
"That's all I need. A bellyaching weapon."
"But you do exist. As a weapon."
"Why is it difficult to remember?"
"Do you want to see her again?"
"Is there any way to get you out of this sword?"
"You're not getting mine!"
"Is that even possible?"
"Not whole enough?"
"That's horrible! I'm so sorry."
"Fair enough. No need for me to bother thinking about it, then."
Text: "알겠어. 그럼 나도 굳이 고민할 필요 없겠네."

TextEng: "I'll try to free you if I can."
"Such a body would need to be soulless, perhaps?"
"Tell me more about your mortal life."
"I want you to boost the enchantment on the sword."
"You appear to be affecting my health. Why is that, exactly?"
Text: "내 건강에 영향을 주는 것 같은데. 정확히 왜 그런 거야?"

TextEng: "What do you mean you're not sure?"
"I'll learn to live with it."
"Could I die from this?"
"Will it get any worse?"
"I suppose I'll just have to sell you, then."
"Can you do something about it?"
"Never mind, then. I'll keep the enchantment for now."
"Alright. Remove the effects for now, then."
"Never mind."
"How about answering some questions?"
"I don't need to know anything else."
"What can you tell me about Undermountain?"
"No, really."
"Do you have any secret powers I should know about?"
"Do you know where there's treasure around here?"
"Tell me more about your mortal life."
"Forgotten?"
"Do you remember any spells?"
"Is there anyone who would miss you?"
"You can service me as a weapon, that's how."
"You can bring a good price at the market."
Text: "시장에서 좋은 값을 받을 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "Good. Let's go, then."
"Never mind, then."
"I know. Drain as much as you can." <StartAction>[-6 Constitution]</Start>
"I know. Drain a moderate amount." <StartAction>[-4 Constitution]</Start>
"I know. Drain only a little." <StartAction>[-2 Constitution]</Start>
"Temporary? Could it be made voluntary?"
